name: Beginning Golf
description: Having some basic knowledge and a passion for learning new sports and hobbies is a must. Learn about the golf swing, rules and etiquette, we will start with a basic grip and stance, move on to putting and chipping and work our way through your bag to get you familiar with all of the clubs so you can enjoy the game and flourish! we will teach you drills and perfect practice techniques that will help make you a more confident player and get you off on the right foot. Previous experience is not req

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: This is a fee based service.
